name: Feel The Box
description:
The Game

Feel The Box its a rhythm music/arcade tower defense game powered by your music

Your objective is to defend the core of the enemies until the song finishes

You can create shields and make them level up

The animations and the enemies are generated by the music and you can load your own tracks

Notes
  • When more vibrate the game title in the main menu more enemies will spawn
  • Some songs may not generate enemies
  • The supported audio formats are .mp3, .wav and .ogg
The Controls

Main menu:

  • Esc – Gamepad Back > Exit game
  • L – Gamepad Press Right Stick > Load song
  • A / Left arrow – Gamepad X > Move left
  • D / Right arrow – Gamepad B > Move right
  • Space – Gamepad Right Shoulder > Next song

Game:

  • P – Gamepad Start > Pause
  • Esc – Gamepad Back > Go to main menu
  • W / Up arrow – Gamepad Y >Move up
  • A / Left arrow –Gamepad X > Move left
  • S / Up arrow – Gamepas A > Move down
  • D / Right arrow – Gamepad B > Move right
Example Songs
  • Bleu Clair, MONXX & LEA - Chop Shop
  • NCT x T & Sugah - Along The Road
  • Jesse Warren - Miles Above You
